name: Willow's Escape: Journey To The Light
name_original: Willow's Escape: Journey To The Light
description:
Immense yourself in this old victorian lab as you help Willow navigate her way out to freedom. 

Willow's Escape: Journey To The Light is a student project created in Innland College  by a team of 6 students: Eileen, Zakarias, Marina, Sigrun, Sigrid & Kari.
